secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with celebrated Olympic sports can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Javelin" and "Discus".

Correct! The rule is: Only items that are typically associated with celebrated Olympic sports can be brought to the picnic.
